DOC.criteria: ASA I III Primary liver cancer tumor single diameter le 3 centimeter There major vascular invasion phenomenon , lymph node extrahepatic metastasis The Child Pugh belong type A type B Had history liver surgery ( include radiofrequency ablation ) Severe disease heart , lung , kidney , immune system INR > 1.5 platelet count le 45000 cells/mm3 History opioid addiction Metastatic liver tumor Not sure primary liver cancer Do n't agree participate experiment
